examples: soldiers who died in defence of their country
soldados que murieron en defensa de su país
What points can be raised in defence of this argument?
¿Qué puntos se pueden plantear en defensa de este argumento?
I have to say in her defence that she knew nothing about it beforehand.
Debo decir en su defensa que ella no sabía nada al respecto de antemano.
When her brother was criticized she leapt to his defence.
Cuando criticaron a su hermano, ella saltó en su defensa.
